name: Jungle Dash
description:
here's a description of all character abilities :)

ilana: 

(SPACE) Ninja Glide - ilana can glide for a few seconds on a slow decent to the ground.

(W) Double Jump - Press W in the air to do another jump.

Toron:

(PASSIVE) Stone Shield -Toron has a natural shield that breaks when colliding with obstacles the shield destroys all obstacles in your view until another obstacle spawns, the shield will recharge after a 25 second cooldown Toron and can collect shieldberries to instantly regain his shield.
